name: 东湖塘历险记/East Lake Pond
name_original: 东湖塘历险记/East Lake Pond
description:
This is a simple little game. You need to click the left and right directions to control the role, and prevent being entrusted to squeeze to death, fall to death and other strange death games. The mysterious underground world is in constant danger and awaits the conquest of the warriors. In the world of layers, stick to the last moment!

Game features:

1. Try all kinds of wonderful extreme operations, test your hand speed and keep breaking your record.



2. Intoxicating levels, more playing methods, more laughter, and addictive games;



3. More feelings, more laughter, the ultimate challenge to your ability to observe and react quickly;



4. You can't stop being happy and enjoy a magnificent adventure on the vision;



Game exploration

1. Try to avoid them. If your character dies, you have to start again. It's very challenging.



2. You need to move your character left and right to help it avoid various mechanisms.

3. It is easy to operate, with few functions, and anyone can easily challenge.
